Files

linera_wasmer/sys/externals/
table.rs

1use crate::store::{AsStoreMut, AsStoreRef};
2use crate::sys::engine::NativeEngineExt;
3use crate::TableType;
4use crate::Value;
5use crate::{vm::VMExternTable, ExternRef, Function, RuntimeError};
6use wasmer_vm::{StoreHandle, TableElement, Trap, VMExtern, VMTable};
7
8#[derive(Debug, Clone)]
9#[cfg_attr(feature = "artifact-size", derive(loupe::MemoryUsage))]
10pub struct Table {
11    handle: StoreHandle<VMTable>,
12}
13
14fn set_table_item(
15    table: &mut VMTable,
16    item_index: u32,
17    item: TableElement,
18) -> Result<(), RuntimeError> {
19    table.set(item_index, item).map_err(|e| e.into())
20}
21
22fn value_to_table_element(
23    store: &mut impl AsStoreMut,
24    val: Value,
25) -> Result<wasmer_vm::TableElement, RuntimeError> {
26    if !val.is_from_store(store) {
27        return Err(RuntimeError::new("cannot pass Value across contexts"));
28    }
29    Ok(match val {
30        Value::ExternRef(extern_ref) => {
31            wasmer_vm::TableElement::ExternRef(extern_ref.map(|e| e.vm_externref()))
32        }
33        Value::FuncRef(func_ref) => {
34            wasmer_vm::TableElement::FuncRef(func_ref.map(|f| f.vm_funcref(store)))
35        }
36        _ => return Err(RuntimeError::new("val is not reference")),
37    })
38}
39
40fn value_from_table_element(store: &mut impl AsStoreMut, item: wasmer_vm::TableElement) -> Value {
41    match item {
42        wasmer_vm::TableElement::FuncRef(funcref) => {
43            Value::FuncRef(funcref.map(|f| unsafe { Function::from_vm_funcref(store, f) }))
44        }
45        wasmer_vm::TableElement::ExternRef(extern_ref) => {
46            Value::ExternRef(extern_ref.map(|e| unsafe { ExternRef::from_vm_externref(store, e) }))
47        }
48    }
49}
50
51impl Table {
52    pub fn new(
53        mut store: &mut impl AsStoreMut,
54        ty: TableType,
55        init: Value,
56    ) -> Result<Self, RuntimeError> {
57        let item = value_to_table_element(&mut store, init)?;
58        let mut store = store.as_store_mut();
59        let tunables = store.engine().tunables();
60        let style = tunables.table_style(&ty);
61        let mut table = tunables
62            .create_host_table(&ty, &style)
63            .map_err(RuntimeError::new)?;
64
65        let num_elements = table.size();
66        for i in 0..num_elements {
67            set_table_item(&mut table, i, item.clone())?;
68        }
69
70        Ok(Self {
71            handle: StoreHandle::new(store.objects_mut(), table),
72        })
73    }
74
75    pub fn ty(&self, store: &impl AsStoreRef) -> TableType {
76        *self.handle.get(store.as_store_ref().objects()).ty()
77    }
78
79    pub fn get(&self, store: &mut impl AsStoreMut, index: u32) -> Option<Value> {
80        let item = self.handle.get(store.as_store_ref().objects()).get(index)?;
81        Some(value_from_table_element(store, item))
82    }
83
84    pub fn set(
85        &self,
86        store: &mut impl AsStoreMut,
87        index: u32,
88        val: Value,
89    ) -> Result<(), RuntimeError> {
90        let item = value_to_table_element(store, val)?;
91        set_table_item(self.handle.get_mut(store.objects_mut()), index, item)
92    }
93
94    pub fn size(&self, store: &impl AsStoreRef) -> u32 {
95        self.handle.get(store.as_store_ref().objects()).size()
96    }
97
98    pub fn grow(
99        &self,
100        store: &mut impl AsStoreMut,
101        delta: u32,
102        init: Value,
103    ) -> Result<u32, RuntimeError> {
104        let item = value_to_table_element(store, init)?;
105        self.handle
106            .get_mut(store.objects_mut())
107            .grow(delta, item)
108            .ok_or_else(|| RuntimeError::new(format!("failed to grow table by `{}`", delta)))
109    }
110
111    pub fn copy(
112        store: &mut impl AsStoreMut,
113        dst_table: &Self,
114        dst_index: u32,
115        src_table: &Self,
116        src_index: u32,
117        len: u32,
118    ) -> Result<(), RuntimeError> {
119        if dst_table.handle.store_id() != src_table.handle.store_id() {
120            return Err(RuntimeError::new(
121                "cross-`Store` table copies are not supported",
122            ));
123        }
124        if dst_table.handle.internal_handle() == src_table.handle.internal_handle() {
125            let table = dst_table.handle.get_mut(store.objects_mut());
126            table.copy_within(dst_index, src_index, len)
127        } else {
128            let (src_table, dst_table) = store.objects_mut().get_2_mut(
129                src_table.handle.internal_handle(),
130                dst_table.handle.internal_handle(),
131            );
132            VMTable::copy(dst_table, src_table, dst_index, src_index, len)
133        }
134        .map_err(Into::<Trap>::into)?;
135        Ok(())
136    }
137
138    pub(crate) fn from_vm_extern(store: &mut impl AsStoreMut, vm_extern: VMExternTable) -> Self {
139        Self {
140            handle: unsafe {
141                StoreHandle::from_internal(store.as_store_ref().objects().id(), vm_extern)
142            },
143        }
144    }
145
146    /// Checks whether this `Table` can be used with the given context.
147    pub fn is_from_store(&self, store: &impl AsStoreRef) -> bool {
148        self.handle.store_id() == store.as_store_ref().objects().id()
149    }
150
151    pub(crate) fn to_vm_extern(&self) -> VMExtern {
152        VMExtern::Table(self.handle.internal_handle())
153    }
154}
155
156impl std::cmp::PartialEq for Table {
157    fn eq(&self, other: &Self) -> bool {
158        self.handle == other.handle
159    }
160}
161
162impl std::cmp::Eq for Table {}
